participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emma is determined to make her mark in the legal world while holding a deep appreciation for her rural upbringing.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Oliver Smith
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Oliver enjoys sharing knowledge and creating engaging experiences for others through art and culture.
participant_2.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.
